TEXT.S:
Francois Rabelais149424~155349Fuolansuowa. Lapuolaikamu nu Hulam: Francois Rabelais149424~155349, mapalekal tawya Fakuomisulitay tunu tademawan a misulitay a tademaw cinida, tawyaay a sasitangahay a pasubanaay tu natangaahan a tademaw. nisulitan ni Lapuolaihan u tanayuay nu aadihan nu cudadan<alikakay a cudad>. <alikakay a cudad>mapulung lima kina nisulitan, naytida i nalumalumaan miala tu kakungkuan, sasulitan han u Kelangkucei, Kakanta, Pantakuay nu tluluay nu dadaydayan nu alikakay a waywayan. 149424cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu siwaw a bataan idaw ku sepat (1494) a mihcaan tusa a bulad sepat a demiad, ci Lapuolailecuhan i Fakuocuopu a Sinuncen, sabaw tu pina' henay a mihcaan, ci Lapuolaimicudad tu tunu kiwkay a cacudadan, micumud tu siwtawyun malasiwse. tiya malingatu minanam tu Sila a nakamuan, mangalay matineng tu Silaatu Luomanu mukasi a lalangawan. 1530 cacay a malebut lima a lasubu tulu a bataan (1530) a mihcaan, ci Lapuolaimicumud tu tabakiay a cacudadan micudad tu nu padekuan a cudad, tusa a bulad kunipicudadan nida maala tu nida ku syase a mingkiwan, malamisaydang(ising) tu. 15321537 cacay a malabut lima a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku tusa a mihcaan, <alikakay a cudad>sayaway a nikatahekal, sakatusa a mihcaan sakatusa tu ku tahekalay nu cudad, amica kuni ka namuh nu binawlan, nika u huing hantu mihapu u caay kaw sapatahekal kina cudad sa. cacay a malebut luma a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku pitu a mihcan maala nida ku Muopili-aytabakiay a cacudadan nu puose anicudadan. 15451550155349 cacay a malebut lima a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku lima (1545) a mihcaan, itida i Kuowan anipalucek patahekal tu dadiputen, u tatengaay tu nu ngangan ni Lapuolaiku sapatahekal tina cudadan u<alikakay a cudad>nu sakatulu a cudadan. nika caay ka tenes mapatay ku Kuowan, yacudad han tu malala'cusay tu a tahekal, ci Lapuolaipapilaliwen tahekal, katukuh tu cacay a malebut lima a lasubu lima a bataan (1550) a mihcaan kya taneng taluma' i Fakuo. taluma satu <alikakay a cudad>itida i cacudadan malasaydan, pasubana' i tawya, mahedek nida ku <alikakay a cudad>saka sepat atu saka lima a cudadan. cacay a malebut lima a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku tulu (1553) sepatay a bulad siwa a demiad, ci Lapuolaiitida i Palia mapatay. tanektekay a tademaw " sitangahay a tademaw ci Lapuolai, cinida u Kawlutademaw, musakamu cinida tu kawlu a makuan matineng musakamu tu Silaa kamu, ci Atikamikinawlan atu kawlu a nipikinawlanan malecad, u sapatideng tu luma' ku papatinakuan, atu Pilaayfu-secensakalecad sa u Lapai-se. ci Ali-setuo-humicidek kunipikakaan tu kawawan, ci Ali-setuo-huhan u caaya kaw kakatinengan ku ba'ketay, ci Lapuolaisa usiidaay.
ci Lapuolaisapidipu tu Sukela-di. Itini nu hatidaay tu nika talakawan ni benison, itini i tukian pasayda i dikud i Tantin, tini ni kakelacan nu bihid ni Tantin, alaw han u kakatawaan ku bihid ni Lapuolai. -- ci Lapuolaica'dungen nida ku kakatawaan nu tabakiay a sakaybihidan tu antang, miliyas tu Silaa papaimungan, patahekal tu kadatengan nida, misuayaw i tamian matawa, pakalaluwahluwah i tamian, atu pakatawa i tamian.
ci Tantinatu ci Lapuolainamakaydaay namin i Kedee'-se'a siwtawyun, nu aydaay a YssuhuFu-etay. wayway ni Tantinkalalaluman, ci Lapuolaihan u kakatawan, ci Hue-tayu hinaciliay a tademaw, u sizia nu kanki a cacay.
hatiniay tu nu sitangahay a tademawan u matinengay naming misanga tu natanga han a tademaw atu matingne mitahaway tu udip nida, ci Lapuolaimakaadih cinida tu sawada' nu tademaw. sapaninac itini tu i udip nu mita, pasusawada'. mapaninac tu, misudikud atu bacu. :;: tademaw han tu, sakalacad ku wayway atu masaleetay, mipulung tu tuluay a nabalucuan anipicuduhan: punu', balucu' atu sawada', u tademaw misuayaw tu icelangay atu masupitay a balucu' u babaueng namin, punu' idaw kuni datengan, balucu' idaw ku ngalay, sawada' mikantuk atu pahabay. nika u sawada' han tu u sakalaluman sananay.
